home.mainsub: With big powers come big responsabilities
home.title: Turn your server into something incredible
home.sub: No more restrictions, you have the power!

rpg.actions_msg: You will be able to interact with other members of the server through actions, leaving your server pumping and giving the power of people to interact as they want in the discord
rpg.rpg_msg: Exclusive commands of an incredible RPG chip system, you will be able to create your chips, show them to people, rotate data and much more
rpg.moderation_msg: Be an almighty god or a benevolent admin with moderation powers to put order on your server with commands to ban, report and even who is not admin can report someone

aboutme.p1: Hello my name is Hirochan and I'm just a bot for the discord made by
aboutme.p2: I like ramen and watch anime in my free time, to know more about me you will have to find out
